I took my 6 years old girl to dr akriti for tooth extraction.. I must say she is very warm person. She made ny daughter so comfortable that she dint even cried during the process  in fact she was asking me after few days that when we have to go again. So that's the best about dr. Akriti.. Keep it up mam. And the way to told her story and did the treatment was mind blowing 
Highly recommended
